Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Watanabe! This is the prize for coming in first in the squad rankings! Instructor said to open it together with you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Why so mysterious... Hm...? A combat knife?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Can't the instructor be more creative? A Gurkha knife... Well, at least it's a good knife. So who came in first? You or me?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "Both of us. But there's only this one prize.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Whatever, I don't need a new knife anyway. I'll just leave it to people like you who wish to die on the front lines every day.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Thanks then. If anything does happen to me one day... Well, take care of it then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Looks like I'm destined to wield this knife.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Dual blades... That should be pretty cool.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bruce's hand wraps tightly around the combat knife, the cold causing his lifeless hand to freeze in place. It was impossible to peel the knife out of his firm grip."}

{3: "Watanabe stands silently. After a while, he crouches down, his comrade's hand in one hand, and the blade of the knife in the other. He carefully extracts the knife, bandages it, and adds it to his gear."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Oasis will be under my leadership starting from today! That is Bruce's... last order!", 4: '1'}
